function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Relevant evidence may exist but decision-makers may be unaware or unable to interpret or apply it to their own context.","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Infodemics and fake news spreading at an unprecedented speed and reach, making it challenging to find trustworthy sources and reliable information.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of cross-sectoral dialogue and collaboration, leading to siloed approaches in public health crisis response.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of coordinated multi-sectoral actions to mitigate public health crisis impact.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of trust in evidence and critical linkages between stakeholders","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid response service may deliver low-quality evidence due to time constraints and urgency, leading to incorrect decision-making.","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of responsiveness to changing priorities and needs","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to identify context-specific knowledge gaps and priorities","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on single case studies and observational studies as best available evidence","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fragmentation of evidence base","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inefficient dissemination of evidence to target audiences","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proliferation of misinformation and fake news on social media platforms during pandemics","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of acoustic privacy in courtyard houses due to inadequate design","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contentment and sense of security in gated communities during the pandemic","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Negative consequences of lockdown policies on crowded residential areas and multi-generational families","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in lifestyle affecting use of homes","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 has changed the perception of home space and created new preferences in the real estate market.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of information and errors leading to rapid and turbulent increase in spread of epidemic","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complex health and ecological challenges may not be adequately addressed through holistic systems-thinking, leading to inefficient interventions.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exclusion of articles based on language english only","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changing the focus of environment and animals as sources of diseases towards salutogenic approaches","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to assess individual factors due to lack of objective measurements","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Minimizing forest edges and designing trails far from forest patches may reduce wildlife protection and mental health benefits while allowing human immersion in nature.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Intensive vegetation management for mental health benefits may be detrimental to wildlife, leading to an increase in urban exploiter species.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Presence of dogs in green spaces can disrupt wildlife activity patterns, but walking dogs is a common motivation for people to visit green spaces.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pandemic-induced spurious correlation in non-experimental research","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased salience and malleability of manipulated variables in experimental research","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of transparency and reproducibility in research practices may lead to misinformation about disease management","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential bias in research focus and coverage due to the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncontrolled spread of infectious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delay in implementation of interventions","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assumptions leading to underestimation of risks","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unmitigated epidemic with predicted deaths","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exceeding critical care bed capacity","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High peak demand on critical care beds beyond surge capacity","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relatively little impact of stopping mass gatherings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of control measures without overwhelming healthcare systems","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delay in initiating social distancing and closure of schools and universities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in the reproduction number r0 and severity of the virus","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Prolonged implementation of social distancing measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Population-wide social distancing measures may be socially disruptive and challenging to implement.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relaxation of social distancing measures may lead to a resurgence of transmission and new waves of infection.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of home isolation and school closures may lead to continued transmission within households and educational institutions.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large stocks of vaccine not available for 18 months or more","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large uncertainties around transmission of the virus and policy effectiveness","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spontaneous adoption of risk-reducing behaviors uncertain","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Evolution of measures for suppression may lead to decreased efficiency of containment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy concerns regarding mobile phone tracking apps may hinder policy effectiveness","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to sustain intensive npi packages for suppression may lead to rapid transmission rebound","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of ineffective epidemic suppression due to school and university closures","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
